name: ColorClear
description: Remove bricks with the same color
author: Bluester16

TrustedRoles.description: List of roles that can use this plugin.

commands.name: colorclear
commands.description: Removes bricks with the same color in the selected region.

args.name: -shp
args.description: Wether or not to check for the brick shape too. Works only with -sel

args.name: -sel
args.description: Get colors and materials in the selected region.

args.name: -clp
args.description: Loads the final save to the clipboard.

args.name: -wsv
args.description: Saves the final save as a brs file. The saved files will mostly look like this: Colorclear-2022-8-1-21-15-3
